## QueryGridInitializerComponent class

Component used for rendering query grid initializer

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class QueryGridInitializerComponent implements QueryGridInitializer, GridPluginGeneric<QueryGridInitializerOptions> 
```
